thread.title: Nordstrom Winter Sale: The Cut Editors Picks
thread.title_full: Nordstrom Winter Sale: The Cut Editors Picks

author: Chinea Rodriguez
title: Nordstrom Winter Sale: The Cut Editors Picks
text:
For more of the Cut’s favorite fashion, beauty, and home finds, sign up for the weekly Cut Shop Newsletter .
January is a slower shopping season. We’ve recovered a bit from the after Christmas sales ; there’s still some time before we have to start grabbing gifts for Valentine’s Day , but that doesn’t mean there aren’t discounts we aren’t eyeing. Enter: Nordstrom’s winter sale. The department store’s yearly sale has officially begun and it’s good. Like really good.
From discounts on designers like Miu Miu and JW Anderson, beauty, and all the essentials you need for winter (time to save on those coats! ), bundle up and shop picks below.
so, you want to shop the Nordstrom sale? ➼ Our top picks
➼ The Best Winter Coats on Sale
➼ The Best Designer on Sale
➼ The Best Clothing on Sale
➼ The Best Shoes on Sale
➼ The Best Accessories on Sale
➼ The Best Beauty on Sale
➼ The Best Home Decor on Sale
.
Our top picks
ELLISS Pinup Print A-Line Drill Skirt $414 $414 Senior shopping editor Bianca Nieves saved on this printed set from Elliss. With a bold pattern and plenty of colors, she can layer this all winter and wear it in the summer.
$414 at Nordstrom Buy
Miaou Karina Asymmetric Hem Halter Cocktail Dress $295 $295 Miaou has several standout pieces, like this cocktail dress. The asymmetric hem is perfect for layering under a sweater and wearing with knee-high boots.
$295 at Nordstrom Buy
Nike ACG Activorium Pants $106 $125 now 15% off $106 Behold the pants you didn’t know you needed: Upgrade your sweatpants situation by getting this discounted Nike pair. It’ll also look great styled with a cotton blouse come spring.
$106 at Nordstrom Buy .
The Best Winter Coats on Sale
Bernardo Heavyweight Longline Puffer Jacket $240 $240 New York weather calls for puffer jackets that are as comfortable and warm as your bed. This insulated Bernardo jacket is just what you need.
$240 at Nordstrom Buy
Avec Les Filles Thermalpuff Crop Puffer Jacket with Rib Bib $240 $240 If you’d rather not sacrifice your look for warmth, this cropped puffer is a happy medium. It’s insulated and water-resistant, so you can still look cute while commuting.
$240 at Nordstrom Buy
Bernardo Shawl Collar Faux Fur Coat $160 $245 now 35% off $160 You probably own enough neutral-colored coats, so switch it up (if only a little) by opting for this gray faux -fur one from Bernardo that will add some texture to all your winter outfits
$160 at Nordstrom Buy .
The Best Designer on Sale
Miu Miu 51mm Gradient Square Sunglasses $489 $489 Save on this square pair of Miu Miu sunglasses. They’re bright green with the brand’s signature gold logo on the sides.
$489 at Nordstrom Buy
JW Anderson Tassel Loafer $675 $675 With the right socks loafers are a year-round shoe. This pair from JW Anderson has a dramatic tassel so we’re sure you don’t already own a similar pair.
$675 at Nordstrom Buy
Tory Burch Hank Sneaker $119 $238 now 50% off $119 We always love how fun Tory Burch’s shoes are, and these sneakers are no different. The chocolate–and–baby-blue color combo will add a nice touch to your denim-on-denim outfits.
$119 at Nordstrom Buy .
The Best Clothing on Sale
BP. Oversize Cozy Mock Neck Sweater $50 $50 Stay cozy with this slightly boxy mock-neck sweater you can layer over your heat tech.
$50 at Nordstrom Buy
STAUD Roland Half Zip Rib Midi Sweater Dress $335 $335 Almost as warm as a sweater but not as boxy. Plus, it’s office appropriate.
$335 at Nordstrom Buy
Topshop Fluffy Knit Pants $77 $77 I love fluffy knits for lounging, but this slightly bootcut silhouette is also perfect for dressing up and pairing with pointy heels.
$77 at Nordstrom Buy
We the Free Good Luck Barrel Leg Corduroy Pants $96 $128 now 25% off $96 Heads up: The Cut Shop–approved barrel jeans are on sale. If you want to get ahead of the trend, start here.
$96 at Nordstrom Buy .
The Best Shoes on Sale
Vince Isabel Pointed Toe Flat $330 $330 Can you wear flats right now? Maybe not, but warmer weather is surely coming. This Vince pair has a pointed toe and sleek silhouette that will make your work look a little less formal.
$330 at Nordstrom Buy
Steve Madden Vinka Bootie $100 $100 Classic black boots are a wardrobe essential. This pair from Steve Madden has a square toe and architectural heel.
$100 at Nordstrom Buy
UGG Classic Mini Platform Boot $170 $170 UGGs sell out fast and are always worth grabbing on sale. These faux shearling-lined boots are my go-to for very cold winter days.
$170 at Nordstrom Buy
Sam Edelman Lyla Knee High Boot $200 $200 Finally, a pair of boots that will a ctually fit wide calves .
$200 at Nordstrom Buy
Vince Billy Pointed Toe Bootie $395 $395 Skip purchasing the suede brown bag and consider buying a pair of suede brown boots instead.
$395 at Nordstrom Buy .
The Best Accessories on Sale
Alexis Bittar Brut Thorn Orbital Hoop Earrings $185 $185 Alexis Bittar is one of my go-to brands for interesting and fun jewelry. I love these textured hoops for everyday wear.
$185 at Nordstrom Buy
Le Specs Unreal 52mm Rectangular Sunglasses $75 $75 At more than half off these are our favorite shades. They look just as good as designer pairs without the designer price.
$75 at Nordstrom Buy
JW PEI Joy Faux Leather Shoulder Bag $89 $89 Trade in your neutral shoulder bag for something brighter, like this pink faux- leather bag from the Gigi Hadid–approved brand .
$89 at Nordstrom Buy The Best Beauty on Sale
Briogeo Don’t Despair, Repair!™ Super Moisture Conditioner for Dry + Damaged Hair $39 $69 now 43% off $39 Winter weather calls for as much additional moisture and care as your hair can get. Briogeo’s conditioner contains nourishing ingredients to help hydrate and repair hair.
$39 at Nordstrom Buy
PURSONIC Nose and Ear Hair Trimmer $18 $18 If you’ve ever wanted to (safely) remove your nose hair s, our experts recommend trimmers to keep things neat.
$18 at Nordstrom Buy .
Best Home Decor on Sale
Le Creuset 10-Quart Enameled Steel Stockpot $130 $130 It’s soup season, so arm yourself with a pot that can handle it all.
$130 at Nordstrom Buy
TWINE Acacia Wood Tablet Cooking Stand $62 $62 While you’re in the kitchen diligently following those soup recipes, this tablet stand is ideal for keep your books and favorite sites on hand.
$62 at Nordstrom Buy
Barefoot Dreams CozyChic Light Essential Throw Blanket $59 $99 now 40% off $59 One of my favorite cozy throws, the supersoft material is warm and light enough to throw on the couch.
$59 at Nordstrom Buy
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->media and entertainment industry
